alert.note: Alert for Converse County Lower Elevations; East Platte County; Goshen County; Niobrara County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 2:02PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A cluster of thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Niobrara, northwestern Goshen, northeastern Platte and southeastern Converse Counties through 230 PM MDT... At 201 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of thunderstorms 8 miles south of Keeline, or 19 miles southwest of Lusk, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Rawhide Buttes. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 PM MDT for southeastern and east central Wyoming.

area.areaDesc: Converse County Lower Elevations; East Platte County; Goshen County; Niobrara County
